name: daibug
description: Browser-to-CLI AI debugging bridge. Gives AI coding agents real-time visibility into your running browser.

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node && bun build src/mcp-stdio.ts --outfile dist/mcp-stdio.js --target node && node -e "const fs=require('fs');['dist/index.js','dist/mcp-stdio.js'].forEach(f=>{const c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');if(!c.startsWith('#!'))fs.writeFileSync(f,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+c)})"
scripts.test: bun test tests/phase1 tests/phase2/source-detection.test.ts tests/phase2/hub-browser-events.test.ts tests/phase2/extension-structure.test.ts tests/phase3
